DOC.detailed_description: The primary endpoint determine incidence Grade IV hematologic toxicity follow Iodine-131 Anti-B1 Antibody consolidation patient diffuse large B-cell NHL achieve response ( PR , CRu , CR ) follow first-line CHOP chemotherapy . The secondary efficacy endpoint determine complete response rate , duration response , duration complete response , progression-free survival , time treatment failure . The pharmacokinetic endpoint determine total body residence time follow dosimetric dose . The secondary safety endpoint determine incidence adverse experience , hematologic toxicity ( e.g. , nadir , time nadir , time recovery ) , use supportive care , percent patient convert human anti-murine antibody ( HAMA ) positivity , survival .
